name: Scand
description:
Scand is a custom software development company located in Minsk, Belarus - in the center of Eastern Europe.
19+ years in IT, more than 600 successful projects for hundreds of customers globally and over 250 highly experienced engineers are our main assets.
 
The company is providing outsourcing services and primarily focusing on software application and product development using .NET, Java, PHP, C/C++ technologies.
Our Core Services are:
• Web Application Development
• Desktop Application Development
• Mobile Application Development
• DevOps
• QA Testing
Since 2000 we've been developing customized solutions for various IT companies, e-commerce businesses, logistics enterprises, education institutions and healthcare organizations. As well as we provide tailored software development for IoT, augmented and virtual reality.
SCAND provides full-cycle software application development services starting from business analysis and design phase to QA testing, deployment, maintenance and support, without using external resources.
